list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His dictatorship depended on the support of the army.

list_definition.definition: a state ruled by a dictator

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: That country is a dictatorship now.

list_ex_of_english: The best way in which to avoid dictatorships and repressive regimes is to enrich the peoples of those countries, rather than impoverishing them.
They risk their lives to flee from dictatorships, conflict and misery.
When people talk about elective dictatorships, perhaps that is what they mean.
Oppressive dictatorships were backed for fear of mass rebellion.
We must not, it seems to me, be distracted or brainwashed by simplistic rhetoric about bolstering up brutal dictatorships.
Dictatorships suppress choice and debase the life of the population in all aspects, impeding progress.
In the end, those dictatorships tumbled because we faced them down.
European history has shown how extremist parties, dressed in democratic clothes and using populist and nationalist propaganda, have often led democracy to dictatorships.
